Uses of Class
model.event.Event

  • Packages that use Event 
    Package Description
    model.event  

    • Uses of Event in model.event

      Subclasses of Event in model.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EarthquakeEvent
      The EarthquakeEvent does damages to the city.
      class  GodsGiftEvent
      The GodsGiftEvent gives resources to the city.
      class  KingsTaxEvent
      The GodsGiftEvent gives resources to the city.
      class  NothingEvent
      The NothingEvent does nothing.
      class  PillageEvent
      The PillageEvent steals some resources, unless knights are there to defend the city.
      Methods in model.event that return Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Event EventFactory.generateEvent(GameBoard world)
      Generates a random Event according to the probability set in EventFactory.event_probabilities
      Methods in model.event that return types with arguments of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Event> KingsTaxEvent.applyEffects(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Applies the king's tax on the currency.
      java.util.List<Event> PillageEvent.applyEffects(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Destroys a tile with a probability of 10%.
      java.util.List<Event> GodsGiftEvent.applyEffects(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Gives resources
      java.util.List<Event> EarthquakeEvent.applyEffects(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Destroys a tile with a probability of 10%.
      java.util.List<Event> NothingEvent.applyEffects(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Apply no effects.
      abstract java.util.List<Event> Event.applyEffects(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Applies the effects of this event.
